author: Gunjan Banerji
title: Duff & Phelps to Buy Corporate-Investigations Firm Kroll
text:
Duff & Phelps Corp. said it would buy investigations and risk-consulting firm Kroll Inc., the latest in a series of acquisitions by the U.S. corporate-finance adviser.
Kroll, currently owned by Corporate Risk Holdings LLC, provides compliance and cybersecurity services to corporate clients. Founded in 1972, the company was started by Jules Kroll, who also established in 2010 Kroll Bond Rating Agency, a separate company, and K2 Intelligence, another investigations firm.
